item.title: How to Setup GitHub Pages with HUGO
item.description: I setup this website with GitHub Pages today. Just want to share my fresh experience with the friends on the internet. Requirement: Create a Github account Install Git What is GitHub Pages? GitHub Pages is a free service provided by GitHub. You can use it to deploy a simple static website. Static basically means it can not be super sophisticated. Since what I need is just a place to record my thoughts and share with other people, it’s useful enough.
